## Best Hyperparameter

```{r}
best_hyper <- data_cv %>%
  group_by(split, prune) %>%
  summarise_at(vars(acc, CramerV), mean) %>% 
  gather(measure, value, acc, CramerV) %>% 
  group_by(measure) %>% 
  filter(value == max(value)) %>% 
  slice(1L)

pander(best_hyper)
```

```{r}
recipe %>%
  prep(data, retain = TRUE) %>%
  fit_rpart(model = TRUE, split = best_hyper$split[[1]],
            prune = best_hyper$prune[[1]]) %>% 
  rpart.plot(fallen.leaves = F)

data_cv %>%
  filter(split == best_hyper$split[[1]], prune == best_hyper$prune[[1]]) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(acc)) +
  geom_density(fill = "lightgrey") +
  theme_minimal()

data_cv %>%
  filter(split == best_hyper$split[[1]], prune == best_hyper$prune[[1]]) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(CramerV)) +
  geom_density(fill = "lightgrey") +
  theme_minimal()
```
